src_original: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudaya āryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  ayaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  sa saṃvṛtisatyakuśalaśca bhavati /  paramārthasatyakuśalaśca bhavati /  lakṣaṇasatyakuśalaśca bhavati /
